text.text_translated:
In the last 200 years, technology and health became better.
The number of people grew very fast because fewer children died young.
Big families had more children.
These children grew up and had their own children.
Contraception is something that stops a woman from having a baby.
In the 1960s, more people could get contraception.
Because of this, women started to have fewer babies.
Before, the average for each woman in the world was about six babies.
Now, the average for each woman in the world is about two babies.
